user.title: HKI ESPHome Humidifier Converter
user.description: Step 1 of 3 — Select the ESPHome climate entity that represents your dehumidifier. The humidity range, available modes and supported HVAC modes will all be read automatically from the entity.

data_description.climate_entity: The climate entity created by your ESPHome midea_dehum (or similar) component.
data_description.name: Name shown in the Home Assistant UI.

modes.title: HVAC Mode & Operating Modes
modes.description: Step 2 of 3 — These values have been read automatically from '{climate_entity}'. Deselect any modes your specific device does not support.

data.on_hvac_mode: HVAC mode used when turning on

data_description.on_hvac_mode: The mode that will be activated on the climate entity when you turn the dehumidifier on. For midea_dehum this is usually 'dry'.
data_description.modes: Only the selected modes will appear in the humidifier mode picker. Deselect any that your device does not respond to.

extras.title: Optional Companion Entities
extras.description: Step 3 of 3 — Link any additional entities that ESPHome created for this device. All fields are optional — leave blank anything your device does not support.

data_description.current_humidity_entity: Only needed if you want to use a separate humidity sensor instead of the value from the climate entity.
data_description.tank_level_entity: Reports the current tank water level (if your device supports it).
data_description.pm25_entity: PM2.5 air quality sensor (if your device supports it).
data_description.bucket_full_entity: Binary sensor that turns on when the water tank is full.
data_description.clean_filter_entity: Binary sensor that turns on when filter cleaning is required.
data_description.defrost_entity: Binary sensor that turns on when the defrost cycle is running.
data_description.ionizer_entity: Switch to control the ionizer (if your device has one).
data_description.pump_entity: Switch to control the pump (if your device supports it).
data_description.sleep_entity: Switch to enable/disable sleep mode (if your device supports it).
data_description.beep_entity: Switch to control whether the device beeps on command.

abort.already_configured: This climate entity is already configured as a humidifier.

core.title: Core Settings
core.description: Update the name for this dehumidifier. The climate entity cannot be changed — remove and re-add the integration to switch entities.
